pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-6037 G-1625 Fix CONTAINS Filter Behavior with Multi-word Filters

timeline.bodyText: maybe an naive question, but I am going to ask anyway.... by modifying the filter.value, do we end up changing the user's input they made?  I am hoping the answer is no, but I have seen it leak before (like in default search titles)
timeline.author: millerw8

replies.bodyText: Double-checked this and the value is not leaking back to the UI or changing the user's entered input
replies.author: bennuttle
